short_desc: Advocates for and protects the legal, civil and service rights of people with developmental disabilities
description: Advocates for and protects the legal, civil and service rights of people with developmental disabilities in Alameda, Contra Costa, Marin, San Francisco and San Mateo counties. All members of the Board of Directors are volunteers.Area Board 5 meets on the 4th Wednesday from 7-9pm. All meetings are open to the public. Call for location.
